name: I`m Turkey
description: I'm Turkey is a simple 2D simulator with elements of survival, with ordinary graphics and usual, but nice plot. In this game you need to overcome various obstacles, playing for a Turkey.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz + Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 6.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard\Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
